wikipedia_page.main: Steven Malcolmson (born 9 April 1983) – also known as Steve Malcolmson, is a Scottish songwriter, record producer, originating from Glasgow, Scotland.

response: MC-VA was picked up after the release of Double 6's by Steven Malcolmson a songwriter signed by BMG Rights Management/Major 3rd Music, credits include Lemar, Ellie Goulding and Kylie Minogue, as well as writing for X Factor finalists. The two have been working in the studio and this led to him songwriting with music production team Biffco writing alongside the likes of Richard "Biff" Stannard and Ash Howes.
All tracks produced by Biffco and Beatgees, with dditional programming by Steven Malcolmson. Original production on "Lifeline" by AFSHeen and Josh Cumbee.
